Tire Birdhouses: Transform tires into birdhouses by drilling a hole in the center and adding a perch for birds to land on.
Tire Wine Racks: Drill a hole in the center of a tire and hang it on a wall to create a wine rack for storing wine bottles.
Tire Dog Beds: Clean and flatten old tires, then use them as unique and comfortable beds for small pets.
Tire Coffee Tables: Attach legs to the bottom of a tire to create a one-of-a-kind coffee table with a rustic charm.
Tire Art Sculptures: Drill holes in the center of tires and stack them to create a unique sculpture, adding an industrial aesthetic to any space.
